entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:03 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -30.7°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
